entity.description: Group of existing or potential customers created for a marketing campaign or other sales purposes.

attributes.name: exchangerate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: listid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the marketing list.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was created.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: ownerid
attributes.description: Owner Id

attributes.name: owningbusinessunit
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record

attributes.name: owninguser
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.

attributes.name: owningteam
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the team that owns the record.

attributes.name: versionnumber
attributes.description: Version Number

attributes.name: importsequencenumber
attributes.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddencreatedon
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: timezoneruleversionnumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: utcconversiontimezonecode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: listname
attributes.description: Type a name for the marketing list so that it is identified correctly in lists.

attributes.name: processid
attributes.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

attributes.name: stageid
attributes.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

attributes.name: traversedpath
attributes.description: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

attributes.name: cost
attributes.description: Type the cost of obtaining the marketing list.

attributes.name: transactioncurrencyid
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: cost_base
attributes.description: Value of the Cost in base currency.

attributes.name: createdfromcode
attributes.description: Select the type of members that this marketing list will contain: accounts, contacts, or leads. Each list can have only one member type and this value can't be changed after the marketing list is created.

constrainedList.name: list_createdfromcode
constrainedList.description: Information about how the marketing list was created. Restricts the type of objects that can be added to the list.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the marketing list, such as the intended use or date of the last update.

attributes.name: donotsendonoptout
attributes.description: Select whether to override the opt-out settings on leads, contacts, and accounts for the members of the target marketing lists of the campaign activity. If No is selected, those who have chosen to opt out won't be excluded from the list. This means they will receive marketing materials.

attributes.name: ignoreinactivelistmembers
attributes.description: Select whether inactive accounts, contacts, or leads should be excluded from the campaign activity distribution when the marketing list is included in a campaign.

attributes.name: lastusedon
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the marketing list was last used in a campaign or in the creation of activities or opportunities.

attributes.name: lockstatus
attributes.description: Select whether the marketing list is locked. If Yes is selected, no additional members can be added to the marketing list.

attributes.name: membercount
attributes.description: Shows the sum of all members in the marketing list.

attributes.name: membertype
attributes.description: Type of the members that can be stored in the marketing list.

attributes.name: purpose
attributes.description: Type the intended use of the marketing list to identify its key segments, target offers, or business group.

attributes.name: query
attributes.description: Query used for retrieving members of marketing list.

attributes.name: source
attributes.description: Type the source of the marketing list, such as a third-party supplier or internal database.

attributes.name: statecode
attributes.description: Shows whether the marketing list is active or inactive. Inactive marketing lists are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

attributes.name: statuscode
attributes.description: Select the marketing list's status.

constrainedList.name: list_statuscode
constrainedList.description: Reason for the status of the marketing list.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Select whether you want the marketing list to be static or dynamic. The members in a static marketing list are unchanging. A dynamic marketing list is based on a dynamic query that retrieves the updated list of members
